# URLs to siege test API endpoints with geoqueries
# siege -c 2 -f siege_postgis_contains.txt

#hit
http://local.phpgeo/api/v1/postgis/locations/contains POST geometry=POLYGON((-84.56586599349976 33.68206818063879,-84.19233083724976 33.870415550941836,-84.3104338645935 33.48872611535025,-84.56586599349976 33.68206818063879))
